price: (118) Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."
arabic: فَٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ فَتۡحٗا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-if'taḥ baynī wabaynahum fatḥan wanajjinī waman maʿiya mina al-mu'minīna
